zeus.concepts
Class AbilitySpecForwardCh

java.lang.Object
  zeus.concepts.AbilitySpec
      zeus.concepts.AbilitySpecForwardCh
public class AbilitySpecForwardCh
extends AbilitySpec

Version:
This class is used to provide abilities for forward chaining. It allows agents to realise when other agents will change their beleifs, and how those beliefs will change!
Author:
Simon Thompson
